overview:
Dan has a reputation of being a spirited, innovative and focused Director with vast experience within the world of advertising.

He started his career in 1994 as a trainee Media Planner / Buyer for one of the UK’s largest direct response agencies and quickly found an eye for a deal â€“ something our clients continue to benefit from!

Outside of work Dan is a devoted follower of Arsenal although he does not get to see the games as much as he would like now, but is trying to convince his 3 young daughters that they should follow in his footsteps!
